item.title: Untaxed Rubbish Truck on Yellow lines, 11th January
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Dene Avenue, Blendon, Greater London

item.title: Goldhurst terrace, 11th January
item.description:
Hello, we have been experiencing roadworks, heavy drilling, lack of parking and often closed roads since last June. It is now January, seven months later. Progress has been incredibly slow. There has been little information shared with residents. The current decision to close the road for an entire month was not communicated to residents at all. Please can you give indication of the plans to complete this work and particularly what monitoring Camden is doing on this very inefficient process. With thanks
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 3, Greencroft Gardens, South Hampstead, Greater London
Report on FixMyStreet
